skills.name: Animal Handling
skills.description: The ability to care for and train various animal species. Includes knowledge of preferred foods, daily habits, and basic signs of disease.

skills.name: Athletics
skills.description: The ability to engage in sports and physical activities, including running, climbing, swimming, and tumbling.

skills.name: Business
skills.description: The ability to manage business affairs, including finance, management, economics and accounting.

skills.name: Combat Sense
skills.description: Training to be aware in dangerous situations like firefights. Used to detect ambushes and for initiative in combat.

skills.name: Communications
skills.description: The ability to operate and maintain communication systems and equipment.

skills.name: Craft
skills.description: The ability to produce useful and artistic creations with one's hands.

skills.name: Defense
skills.description: The ability to avoid incoming attacks by using cover or dodging.

skills.name: Electronic Warfare
skills.description: The ability to operate and counter electronic systems, including ECM and ECCM.

skills.name: Exo Pilot
skills.description: The ability to pilot Exo-Armor (mecha) suits used in Jovian space.

skills.name: Gunnery (Exo)
skills.description: The ability to operate weapon systems mounted on Exo-Armor units.

skills.name: Hand-to-hand
skills.description: Proficiency in close-range unarmed combat techniques.

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: The ability to collect information on people, places and events.

skills.name: Language
skills.description: The ability to communicate and be literate in additional languages.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: The capacity to lead others, either by example or through inspiration.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: The ability to diagnose and treat various pathological conditions.

skills.name: Melee
skills.description: Proficiency with close-combat weapons such as knives or batons.

skills.name: Natural Sciences
skills.description: Knowledge of scientific disciplines like physics, chemistry, biology, etc.

skills.name: Navigation (Space)
skills.description: The ability to plot courses and determine position in space.

skills.name: Negotiation
skills.description: The ability to influence decisions in bargaining or transactions.

skills.name: Notice
skills.description: The ability to perceive details that may otherwise be overlooked.

skills.name: Personal Flight Device
skills.description: The ability to use and control personal flight devices like EVA units.

skills.name: Pilot (Ground)
skills.description: The ability to control and maneuver ground vehicles.

skills.name: Pilot (Air)
skills.description: The ability to pilot atmospheric aircraft.

skills.name: Pilot (Space)
skills.description: The ability to pilot spacecraft in the vacuum of space.

skills.name: Small Arms
skills.description: Proficiency with man-portable firearms such as pistols and rifles.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: The ability to go undetected and move silently.

skills.name: Streetwise
skills.description: Knowledge of the underground elements of society and how to interact with them.

skills.name: Social Sciences
skills.description: Knowledge of humanities disciplines like history, psychology, sociology, etc.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: The ability to survive in hostile environments.

skills.name: Technical Sciences
skills.description: Knowledge of technical fields like computer science, electronics, mechanics, etc.

skills.name: Zero-G
skills.description: The ability to move and function in zero or micro-gravity environments.
